name: 2 Bedroom Garden View Private Apartment
descriptionShort: Spacious and newly renovated 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of Whitby. Features a private entrance, free parking, high-speed Wi-Fi, and patio doors opening to a large private backyard. The kitchen is fully equipped for entertaining, while the master bedroom offers a queen pillow-top bed and the second bedroom a cozy double.
descriptionLong: Spacious and newly renovated 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of Whitby. Features a private entrance, free parking, high-speed Wi-Fi, and patio doors opening to a large private backyard.
The kitchen is fully equipped for entertaining, while the master bedroom offers a queen pillow-top bed and the second bedroom a cozy double.
Walking distance to the waterfront, marina, Iroquois Park Sports Centre, transit, and downtown—an ideal alternative to hotels.
Address: 1515 Dufferin St, Whitby, ON L1N 1B3, Canada
